Text:
Would like to request:
1) House MD ipod format season 2 and the following seasons.
2) Lost all seasons.

In movies I really need the following classics in Ipod format:

Chinatown
Gone with the wind
12 Angry Men
The Sting
Charlie Chaplin Classics
Insomnia (although not a classic, yet a Nolan masterpiece with a great cast)
One Flew over the Cuckoo's nest
Wild Strawberries
Casablanca
It's a Wonderful Life
Singing in the Rain
The singing detective
Maltese Falcon 
Schindler's List

THANKS! rsvp.
